DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational study is to assess predictors of in-hospital mortality in patients with acute myocardial infarction admitted to Belgian hospitals.
DOC.brief_title: Mortality Analysis of ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction (STEMI) Patients in Belgium
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction with ST elevation or left bundle branch blok pattern on ECG acute myocardial infarction as an acute complication of coronary intervention
